items.title: Bills promote Brady to head coach on 5-year deal
items.description: The Bills have promoted offensive coordinator Joe Brady to head coach on a five-year deal, the team announced Tuesday.

items.title: McCarthy 'definitely' would like Rodgers to return
items.description: New Steelers coach Mike McCarthy said he would like to see Aaron Rodgers return as the team's starting quarterback in 2026.

items.title: OC out as Jets' revamp continues, sources say
items.description: The Jets are parting ways with offensive coordinator Tanner Engstrand, sources told ESPN on Tuesday.

items.title: Payton: Nix was 'predisposed' to inevitable injury
items.description: Sean Payton said at his season-ending news conference Tuesday that Denver Broncos quarterback Bo Nix had a preexisting ankle condition that made a fra...

items.title: Mensah, Duke settle dispute as QB eyes Miami
items.description: Darian Mensah and Duke have agreed to a settlement of their dispute that will clear the way for the quarterback to transfer to another school.
